name: Run Run Don't Die (The Indie Accord)
name_original: Run Run Don't Die (The Indie Accord)
description:
Run Run is a short platform runner inspired by Mario games (both new and old) and features a speed run style timer and online high scores so that players can compare their best runs against each other. Run, jump, throw your hat/bounce on it, and avoid/defeat enemies as you race for the fastest time!

The highscores can be seen here!
